title: Simplify Development Task Interface
description: Remove cluttered UI elements including Branch link, PR created and ready for development text, and Rebase link from the Development Task interface to create a streamlined, focused user experience.
iWant: a clean Development Task interface without unnecessary UI clutter
soThat: I can focus on core development activities without visual distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development message is removed
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Core development task functionality remains intact and accessible
